long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FileFlex application development tools.

First go to the options page and set a valid secret in order to access the extension's funcionalities.

Curretnly it can :
1. Fast shortcuts to common Adapter related actions like clear cache and show cache
2. Possibility to change the logging level of different loggers in runtime
3. Possibility to change the CSS applied skin again in runtime
4. Allows to change certain JS and CSS resources, this will make it possible to use one server version with a different app-client as now they are always coupled

----------------
To be done
1. Possibility to return predefine resource caps/features for different resource names - currently this is possible only for the Dummy provider and configured on build time
